v0.2.0 (2021-03-13)
-------------------
- Renamed project to "mailbits"
- Added a `ContentType` class
- Exposed the `message2email()` function
- Exposed the `MessageDict` type
- Added the following functions:
    - `format_addresses()`
    - `parse_address()`
    - `parse_addresses()`
    - `recipient_addresses()`

v0.1.0 (2021-02-28)
-------------------
Initial release
